item.cobalt.mechanical_hand.tooltip: When your own hands are not strong enough
item.cobalt.mechanic_boots.tooltip: Special armor designed for performing heavy maintenance on various systems within Facility EF002. Features a simple exoskeleton that enhances the strength of the wearer, at the cost of some mobility.
item.cobalt.mechanic_leggings.tooltip: Special armor designed for performing heavy maintenance on various systems within Facility EF002. Features a simple exoskeleton that enhances the strength of the wearer, at the cost of some mobility.

item.cobalt.mechanic_helmet.tooltip: Special armor designed for performing heavy maintenance on various systems within Facility EF002. Features a simple exoskeleton that enhances the strength of the wearer, at the cost of some mobility.
item.cobalt.mechanic_gloves.tooltip: Keep the grease off your hands
item.cobalt.mechanic_spectacles.tooltip: Allows the wearer to see the status of site EF002 systems
item.cobalt.gearstrap.tooltip: Tight belt with small gears attached
item.cobalt.reinforced_mechanic_boots.to: Even heavier leather boots, reinforced with steel

item.cobalt.reinforced_mechanic_chestpla: Extremely heavy chestplate. Reinforced with steel
item.cobalt.reinforced_mechanic_helmet.t: Helmet made for working in dangerous environments
item.cobalt.basic_drill.ability: Use: Gain haste for 10s. Consumes coal
item.cobalt.miner_helmet.tooltip: Standard issue miners helmet for Kiln and Cross workers. It offers decent protection from the elements. Provides light while working in dark environments.
item.cobalt.miner_chestplate.tooltip: Standard issue miners chestplate for Kiln and Cross workers. It offers decent protection from the elements.
item.cobalt.miner_leggings.tooltip: Standard issue miners leggings for Kiln and Cross workers. It offers decent protection from the elements.
item.cobalt.miner_boots.tooltip: Standard issue miners boots for Kiln and Cross workers. It offers decent protection from the elements.
item.cobalt.miner_pickaxe.tooltip: Pickaxe meant for mining and punching things
item.cobalt.prospector_pickaxe.tooltip: Used by individuals within the Kiln and Cross for finding and identifying mineral deposits.
item.cobalt.prospector_helmet.tooltip: Worn by individulas within the Kiln and Cross that specialized in finding and identifying mineral deposits, and looking stylish while doing so.

item.cobalt.tinker_boots.tooltip: Light leather boots made for moving quickly through tight spaces
item.cobalt.thermal_gear_set_bonus.toolt: Allows the wearer to withstand immense heat
item.cobalt.lumberjack_chestplate.toolti: It seems to have been left here for some time
item.cobalt.lumberjack_helmet.tooltip: Provides adequate protection against the environments
item.cobalt.infected_adventure_sword.too: A familiar sword infected by corruption
item.cobalt.infected_adventure_sword.abi: Use: Gain strength for 1m. Consumes 10 health

item.cobalt.ruined_gear.tooltip: Gear ruined by years of weathering
item.cobalt.diving_helmet.tooltip: Diving suit used by workers within EF002 to perform maintenance in underwater areas. This suit works by converting surrounding water into breathable air, providing an infinite amount of time underwater. It is also heavily insulated, providing protection from cold water environments.
item.cobalt.diving_chestplate.tooltip: Diving suit used by workers within EF002 to perform maintenance in underwater areas. This suit works by converting surrounding water into breathable air, providing an infinite amount of time underwater. It is also heavily insulated, providing protection from cold water environments.
item.cobalt.diving_leggings.tooltip: Diving suit used by workers within EF002 to perform maintenance in underwater areas. This suit works by converting surrounding water into breathable air, providing an infinite amount of time underwater. It is also heavily insulated, providing protection from cold water environments.
item.cobalt.diving_boots.tooltip: Diving suit used by workers within EF002 to perform maintenance in underwater areas. This suit works by converting surrounding water into breathable air, providing an infinite amount of time underwater. It is also heavily insulated, providing protection from cold water environments.
item.cobalt.exoskeleton_helmet.tooltip: Armor developed by the H.S.A. during the early days of the War. It was the first version of a series of weapons meant to improve mobility and combat prowess for soldiers on the battlefield.
item.cobalt.exoskeleton_chestplate.toolt: Armor developed by the H.S.A. during the early days of the War. It was the first version of a series of weapons meant to improve mobility and combat prowess for soldiers on the battlefield.

Become immovable for a short moment. Gain strength and resistance.
Armor developed by the H.S.A. during the early days of the War. It was a more advanced version of the MK I, featuring increased defensive capabilities. Usually used by special service soldiers.

item.cobalt.rune_glove.tooltip: Used in ancient times to unlock the power of runes. Should be inert, yet it sparkles with magical power... Has 5 slots where runes can be inserted.

item.cobalt.light_soul.tooltip: Mysterious orb of light. Emits a low hum.
